data.eml:eml: The correct name in Oenothera for Gaura drummondii (Onagraceae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wagner, Warren L., Hoch, Peter C., Zarucchi, James L. (2015): The correct name in Oenothera for Gaura drummondii (Onagraceae). PhytoKeys 50: 25-29, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.50.4886, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.50.4886
